results.title: Metformin prevents hypoxia-induced podocyte injury by regulating the ZEB2/TG2 axis.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ could be explored to treat @DISEASE_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D004194 @@@proteinuric diseases@@@ such as @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@CKD@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Apnea_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012891 @@@sleep apnea@@@ and @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@renal Ischemia-reperfusion-injury@@@, where @DISEASE_Hypoxia @DISEASE_MESH:D000860 @@@hypoxia@@@ is considered a risk factor.

citations.NLM: Kolligundla LP, Kavvuri R, Singh AK, Mukhi D, Pasupulati AK. Metformin prevents hypoxia-induced podocyte injury by regulating the ZEB2/TG2 axis. Nephrology (Carlton). 2023 Jan;28(1):60-71. PMID: 36217796

results.title: Novel Insights Into Monogenic Obesity Syndrome Due to INPP5E Gene Variant: A Case Report of a Female Patient
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ is managed by regular nutritional advice, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, antihypertensive medication, and non-invasive respiratory support during @DISEASE_Sleep_Wake_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D012893 @@@sleep@@@.

citations.NLM: Drole Torkar A, Avbelj Stefanija M, Bertok S, Trebušak Podkrajšek K, Debeljak M, Stirn Kranjc B, Battelino T, Kotnik P. results.title: Sleep apnea is induced by a high-fat diet and reversed and prevented by metformin in non-obese rats.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Apnea_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012891 @@@Sleep apnea@@@ is induced by a high-fat diet and reversed and prevented by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in non-@DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.
